transcript:
Customer: Is karam ka karu shukr kaise ada, is karam ka karu shukr kaise ada, jo karam mujh pe mere nabi kar liya, mai sajata hu sarkar ki mehfile mai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Raja Marble trader me baat ho rahi hai meri?
Executive: Ah ji sir.
Executive: Rajesh sir good good evening Deepak baat kar raha hu India Mart head office Noida se.
Customer: Ha sir boliye.
Executive: Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Acche hai.
Executive: Apna catalog chal raha hai sir India Mart ke portal pe something aapka teen mahine hi service ko run run hue the right.
Customer: Sir lead nahi aa rahi. Lead nahi aa rahi bilkul bhi.
Executive: Sir aap use karenge do teen basis pe bhi aap valid consume karenge to tabhi to valid ka flow badhega sir aap use to bilkul hi nahi kar rahe sir service ko.
Customer: Sir lead kharab ho jayegi kya kare fir.
Executive: Lead kharab ho jayegi matlab?
Customer: Sir agar hamare kuch kaam ki lead ho to hum le na.
Executive: Nahi aap ye bataiyega sir dekhiye aap mujhe ye bataiye aap Rajasthan me hi deal karte hain ya pan India level pe deal karte hain.
Customer: All India.
Executive: All India me deal karte hain to all India level pe valid aap dekh rahe hain to abhi bhi achi khasi valid hai sir pan India level pe to. Aisa to hai hi nahi ki sir pan India level pe valid hi nahi hai.
Pune Maharashtra se apne pass me valid aayi hui hai uske baad me Pune Maharashtra Maharashtra Thane Maharashtra location se to sabse jyada valid. Jyada tulsi ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Sorry?
Customer: Tulsi ki tulsi ki jyada lead aa rahi hai wo.
Executive: Tulsi to aapne add aapne add kiya hua hai na sir tulsi to.
Customer: Ha. Aur wo aa raha hai wo.
Executive: Add kiya.
Customer: Wooden ka wooden ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm. Aap mujhe ye bataiye jab tulsi stand aapne add kiya hua hai to tulsi stand ki to valid aayengi na aayengi na sir aapke pass.
Customer: Sir ek second mandir kabhi gaya na par wooden ka jyada aa raha hai fir wo.
Executive: Wooden ka aa raha hai to wo mai ek bar wooden ka check kar leta hu wooden ka kyu aa raha hai aapne koi product search to nahi kiya wooden wala aapne apni side me.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Ek minute ruk jaiye wooden ka koi hai nahi hai.
Executive: Marble bath tub ho gaya uske baad me.
Executive: Marble inlay flooring hai. Marble ye tulsi hai. To ye jo aap bata rahe hain wooden ka mujhe to sir koi bhi valid show nahi ho rahi hai wooden ki.
Executive: Suppose ek cheez bataiye mandir ke andar mandir.
Customer: Ha ha. Mandir ke andar sir wo wooden wooden ki aa rahi hai wahi wahi lead lakdi ke andar hi.
Customer: Ha marble nahi aa rahi wo.
Executive: Check kar leta hu sir aa rahi hogi dekhiye 100% valid to koi bhi possible nahi hai sabhi tarah ka India Mart pe run karta hai correct hai is aapke pass me ek do valid wooden ki aa bhi rahi hai to use aapke pass me option hota hai not relevant mark karne ka.
Customer: Ha fir wahi karte hai.
Executive: Ha. To waha se aap not relevant mark kijiyega ek do din teen din char din aap valid not relevant mark karenge automatically aapke pass me wo aani band ho jayegi. Thik hai wo category aapki side se close ho jayegi thik hai aur jo aap bata rahe hain mandir ka kaise bata rahe hain sir mandir ke me kaisi valid aa rahi hai.
Customer: Wo wooden lakdi ki wahi aa rahi hai mandir ke andar bhi.
Executive: To apne apne pass me total product marble ke hain.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To marble jab aapke pass hai to sare sare products aapke marble hi to added hai koi ek do valid aa rahi hai to use not relevant mark kar dijiyega ye cheeze aapki correct ho jayengi second thing mai aapko ek cheez aur bata deta hu jaise aap pan India level pe deal kar rahe hain marble ke andar to bahut acha khasa business hai sir India Mart pe. Suppose that aapko koi order value ka to koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Order value aapke liye comfortable hai sari?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Jaise marble handicraft hai marble handicraft me aapne map kiya hua hai marble masjid mimbar mimbar marble handicraft ha mimbar mimbar add kiya hua hai abhi ye koi category match thodi kar rahi hai sir India Mart pe right dusri stone stone tulsi pot hai usme aapne marble tulsi pot add kiya hua hai marble aur stone same hota hai alag alag hota hai.
Customer: Alag alag hota hai.
Executive: To aapne stone me marble map kiya hua hai uske baad me mimbar ki mai baat karu only mimbar masjid mimbar aur bhi mimbar aur bhi product me aata hai usme aata hai category me aata hai ya keval marble me hi aata hai.
Customer: Nahi sir marble me aate hai wo wooden ke wo bhi aate hai na jiski.
Executive: Mimbar wooden ka bhi hota hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To aapki jo mapping hi incorrect hai sir to cheeze kaise correct hongi aap bataiyega aap thoda sa time video meet pe nikaliye sir ye cheeze mai correct kara deta hu aapki.
Customer: Ab mere partner se baat karta hu usse mai.
Executive: Partner se aap baat kar lijiyega thoda sa time aap nikaliega ye mapping aapki correct kara dunga to valid automatically correct aani start ho jayengi cheeze aapki correct ho jayengi sir aapne India Mart ko paisa diya bhi hai 28000 30000 jo bhi India Mart ko diya bhi hai. Sir fir wo GST ki chutegi wo.
Customer: Kya kare?
Executive: Wo GST India Mart wali wo kaise chutegi?
Executive: Kya nahi chutegi?
Customer: GST kaise chutegi wo?
Executive: Wo refund aata hai na wapas. Samajh nahi.
Customer: GST ka wo.
Executive: To kiska sir? Form bhrte hai na hum us time par 33000 kuch hota hai wo fir wo GST 5000 wapas aa jata hai khate ke andar.
Executive: Ha ha 33 aapne jo pay kiya tha mai bata raha hu GST aapne return return file ki nahi hai abhi?
Customer: Nahi sir ho hi nahi rahi wo kaise hogi fir wo.
Executive: Wo apne CA se baat kijiyega na sir CA karayega wo to aapki cheeze aap unhe bill provide kara dijiyega shayad aapne 28000 28 plus GST aapko ne pay kiya tha 54000 plus aapki return aayegi. Ha.
Customer: Nahi wo keh rahe ki iska pehle iska bill katao pehle iska India Mart pehle first time ka order ka bill katao uske baad uthegi wo.
Executive: Ha mai performa aapko bhej dunga ya aap download bhi kar sakte hain aapne jis time pe pay kiya tha us time pe performa aapko milta bhi hai thik hai. Se baat kijiye wo return file kara dega. Ha wo to hamare pass hai.
Customer: Ha thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai aap thoda sa time nikaliye possible hai to mai abhi connect kar leta hu sir video meet pe aapko. Nahi nahi abhi to mai shayad shadi me aaya hua hu isliye.
Executive: Kis time pe mai connect karu bataiye abhi mera dost free ho jayega na usko mai phone kar lunga fir wo hum dono wahi pe ja ke kar lenge.
Executive: Nahi kal parso aaj kab karu?
Customer: Agar aaj ho to mai bhi aapko form kar dunga turant hi.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega thik hai. Ha.
Customer: Thik sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads (wooden products).

- Wants to know about GST refund process.



Resolution:

- Advised to mark irrelevant buyleads as 'not relevant'.

- Executive will check why wooden buyleads are being received.

- Executive offered to correct mapping via video meet.

- Advised to contact CA for GST return filing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with partner and schedule video meet.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, gst, mapping, refund
